S.FORM: Ruben Boumtje-Boumtje sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1978, ryax sa tay 20 nqu tay 5, Ruben Boumtje-Boumtje, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Roben Boomtje-Boomtje sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1978, ryax sa tay 20 nqo tay 5, Roben Boomtje-Boomtje, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
